article_title: Pay now or pay later: Rock County Human Services asking for more drug treatment money
article_text:
JANESVILLE—Local law enforcement officials, judges and prosecutors dealing with the effects of heroin in Rock County agree: ...

article_metadata.Description: The Rock County Human Services Department is asking the county board for additional money to help addicts get well and keep them out of the criminal justice system.
article_metadata.author: Catherine W. Idzerda
